<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_composite"><sys_ux_data_broker_composite action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><api_name>x_1434439_my_tem_0.EVAM emergency alert composite databroker</api_name><data_drivers>{
  "compositeQueryMeta": {
    "definition" : {
      "id" : "83b97b30773300108d070d74c81061f7",
      "type" : "GRAPHQL"
    },
    "elementId" : "compositeQueryMeta",
    "inputValues" : {
      "evamDefinitionId" : {
        "type": "BROKER_INTERNAL_INPUT_BINDING",
        "binding": {
          "address": [
            "evamDefinitionId"
          ]
        }
      }
    },
    "elementLabel" : "Metadata defining the Composite Data Query"
  },
  "compositeDataEntities": {
    "definition" : {
      "id" : "eaafa603773300108d070d74c81061b6",
      "type" : "GRAPHQL"
    },
    "elementId" : "compositeDataEntities",
    "inputValues" : {
      "evamMetadata" : {
        "type": "BROKER_INTERNAL_STATE_BINDING",
        "binding": {
          "address": [
            "compositeQueryMeta",
            "output",
            "data",
            "GlideCompositeDataMetadata_Query",
            "getMetadata"
          ]
        }
      },
      "pageNumber" : {
          "type": "BROKER_INTERNAL_INPUT_BINDING",
          "binding": {
            "address": [
              "pageNumber"
            ]
          }
      },
      "pageSize" : {
          "type": "BROKER_INTERNAL_INPUT_BINDING",
          "binding": {
            "address": [
              "pageSize"
            ]
          }
      },
      "pageCursor" : {
          "type": "BROKER_INTERNAL_INPUT_BINDING",
          "binding": {
            "address": [
              "pageCursor"
            ]
          }
      },
      "filterPreference" : {
          "type": "BROKER_INTERNAL_INPUT_BINDING",
          "binding": {
            "address": [
              "filterPreference"
            ]
          }
      }
    },
    "elementLabel" : "Collated records from Composite Data Query"
  },
  "compositeDataViews": {
    "definition" : {
      "id" : "9732a25c4822021007db5079112127bf",
      "type" : "TRANSFORM"
    },
    "elementId" : "compositeDataViews",
    "inputValues" : {
      "graphqlData" : {
        "type": "BROKER_INTERNAL_STATE_BINDING",
        "binding": {
          "address": [
            "compositeDataEntities",
            "output"
          ]
        }
      }
    },
    "elementLabel" : "Composite Data as View objects"
  }
}</data_drivers><description/><name>EVAM emergency alert composite databroker</name><operations/><output_properties>[
 {
    "name": "compositeDataViews",
    "label": "EVAM Data",
    "description": "Stream of data objects from EVAM sources",
    "origin": {
       "type": "data",
       "id": "compositeDataViews"
    }
  }
]</output_properties><private>false</private><props>[
{
  "name": "evamDefinitionId",
  "label": "EVAM Definition",
  "description": "Select an EVAM definition record",
"readOnly": false,
"fieldType": "reference",
  "mandatory": true,
  "typeMetadata": {
      "reference": "sys_ux_composite_data"
    }
},
{
  "name": "pageCursor",
  "label": "Page Cursor",
  "description": "Page cursor for EVAM pagination",
  "readOnly": false,
  "fieldType": "string",
  "mandatory": false,
  "defaultValue": ""
},
{
  "name": "pageSize",
  "label": "Page Size",
  "description": "Page size for EVAM pagination",
  "readOnly": false,
  "fieldType": "string",
  "mandatory": false,
  "defaultValue": "20"
},
{
  "name": "pageNumber",
  "label": "Page Number",
  "description": "Page number for EVAM pagination",
  "readOnly": false,
  "fieldType": "string",
  "mandatory": false,
  "defaultValue": "0"
},
{
  "name": "filterPreference",
  "label": "EVAM Filter Preference",
  "description": "Shows sys_ids for EVAM data filter",
  "readOnly": false,
  "fieldType": "string",
  "mandatory": false,

}
]</props><required_translations>[{"message":"Page size for EVAM pagination","comment":""},{"message":"Page number for EVAM pagination","comment":""},{"message":"EVAM Filter Preference","comment":""},{"message":"Page Number","comment":""},{"message":"Select an EVAM definition record","comment":""},{"message":"Page Cursor","comment":""},{"message":"Page Size","comment":""},{"message":"Shows sys_ids for EVAM data filter","comment":""},{"message":"EVAM Definition","comment":""},{"message":"Page cursor for EVAM pagination","comment":""}]</required_translations><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_composite</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-29 17:32:16</sys_created_on><sys_id>3232625c0622021052c74c65b06960ae</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>EVAM emergency alert composite databroker</sys_name><sys_package display_value="My Template App" source="x_1434439_my_tem_0">7232625c53220210d9568cfbe92e8074</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="My Template App">7232625c53220210d9568cfbe92e8074</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_composite_3232625c0622021052c74c65b06960ae</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-29 17:32:16</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_composite></record_update>
